RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YES POINT rated just off leader to the half, cleared into far turn, hooked in the stretch run and dug in to prevail on the wire. GRASSROOTS good position off rail to far turn, rallied three wide, outgamed. BACON inside trip to far turn with no late kick between horses stretch. LIGHTNING CASHES speed to the front, led to far turn and gave in through the drive. GUS GUS always trailed while far back into the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Bacon
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to far turn with no late kick between horses stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gus Gus
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed while far back into the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position off rail to far turn, rallied three wide, outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Lightning Cashes
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, led to far turn and gave in through the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Yes Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off leader to the half, cleared into far turn prevail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GENERATOR had an awkward start, ran up to contend to far turn kept on in the stretch run to run clear. DR. FORMAN chased early on, shuffle back far turn, wide run for place spot. MIDNIGHT J J inside speed to the front, led to quarter pole, gave in stretch. HARD LIGHTING chasing leaders between horses to far turn, no late kick stretch. CAPPY HOUR saved ground to no avail while giving way steadily.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight J J
ENTRY.OWNER: Sweet Carolina Racing and Bourbon LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, led to quarter pole, gave in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to no avail while giving way steadily

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Lighting
ENTRY.COMMENT: chasing leaders between horses to far turn, no late kick stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Generator
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, ran up to contend far turn kept on clear

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Forman
ENTRY.OWNER: Southern Springs Stables (Ron Moquett) and Maplewood LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early on, shuffle back far turn, wide run for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SLOAN STREET was reluctant to load, well rated three wide into first turn, sent to front the stretch at the half, well handled to the stretch while well clear, swerved in through the final furlong changing leads while going well clear to the wire. DOGWOODS BECCA speed to the front, between horses to far turn, no match stretch. DELTA WISHES good position to far turn could not keep up, settled for show. LEXINGTON DIAMOND good position to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run. KENTE KLARKE tried to keep up for a half but faded from far turn and stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Lexington Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn with nothing left in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Kente Klarke
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up for a half but faded from far turn and stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Dogwoods Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: Scott Anthony L Scott Chris L and Scott Mindy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, between horses to far turn, no match stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Delta Wishes
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to far turn could not keep up, settled for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sloan Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated three wide, sent to front stretch swerved late clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RHYTHMIC RULER good speed, dueled to turn, cleared past quarter pole to hold sway in the furlong, clear. EL PEJE tried to stay with winner inside, could not keep up and gamely held for place spot. ZAMFIR off rail run to turn, ran from quarter pole for show spot. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR off rail chase of top pair to turn, could not keep up in stretch. SOUTHERN WILL always trailed with no late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: El Peje
ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to stay with winner inside, could not keep up, held for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase of top pair to turn, could not keep up in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Zamfir
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to turn, ran from quarter pole for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythmic Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, dueled to turn, cleared past quarter pole, clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 80. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT HURRICANE inside to the front, well rated to the turn, roused past quarter pole to go clear in the final furlong. ALL JOKES ASIDE dueled winner to the turn, could keep up in the stretch and stayed for place. ALL ABOUT CROGE chased top pair throughout, stayed game to just miss place spot. HALLOWEEN off rail trip while never a real menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Hurricane
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to the front, well rated to the turn, roused to go clear

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair throughout, stayed game to just miss place spot

ENTRY.NAME: All Jokes Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled winner to the turn, could keep up in the stretch stayed 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Halloween
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail trip while never a real menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKLYNN'S DABOMB in hand to the quarter pole, roused to go on, well clear to wire. NOT A ROLE MODEL broke well outside, close up to quarter pole, could not keep up. YOU'RE A DANDY speed from inside to turn, could not go on, weakened for show. SISTER JUSTICE inside run to turn while never a menace in the stretch run. ABIGAIL G brief speed from inside, gave way readily thereafter. ZACHS GOLDEN OLDIE awkward from gate, never menaced throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: You're a Dandy
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed from inside to turn, could not go on, weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: Abigail G
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from inside, gave way readily thereafter

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn while never a menace in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Zachs Golden Oldie
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from gate, never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklynn's Dabomb
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand to the quarter pole, roused to go on, well clear to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Role Model
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well outside, close up to quarter pole, could not keep up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANN KOR inside speed to the front well rationed to stretch and stayed clear while geared down in the final sixteenth to the wire while tons the best. SAUNTER chased top pair to deep stretch, along for place spot no match. AWESOME VALOR chased winner to stretch, outgamed late going for place spot. AWESOME MARINA could not keep up to the stretch, passed a couple from turn. STRONG PROFILE awkward start, through early with a steady retreat from turn. FUNNY CHIC never menaced throughout. FIRST WARDEN through early, stopped to a walk in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Ann Kor
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front well rationed to stretch, stayed clear

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Profile
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, through early with a steady retreat from turn

ENTRY.NAME: First Warden
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, stopped to a walk in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up to the stretch, passed a couple from turn

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Chic
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to stretch, outgamed late going for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Saunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to deep stretch, along for place spot no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 4, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPIRITCATCHER no speed to far turn, rallied outside to quarter pole with a late kick to blow past leader while ridden out to the wire. SHE'S A KEEPER sprinted off to a long lead, stayed on to the stretch, no match. LUCKY SHORE raced along evenly to far turn, came on for show spot stretch. WILMORE saved ground while well back to far turn, rallied on to improve. LONG BLACK VEIL saved ground to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run. SOULSTONE unhurried early, ran up to the half outside bid far turn faltered. GET CLEAR chased pace to the stretch, gave in readily in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Long Black Veil
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Wilmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground while well back to far turn, rallied on to improve

ENTRY.NAME: Get Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the stretch, gave in readily in the lane

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Keeper
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted off to a long lead, stayed on to the stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Spiritcatcher
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, rallied outside to blow past, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Soulstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, ran up to the half outside bid far turn faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Shore
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to far turn, came on for show spot stretch
